verses.verse: Now Moses <WH4872> was pasturing <WH7462> the flock <WH6629> of Jethro <WH3503> his father-in-law, the priest <WH3548> of Midian; <WH4080> and he led <WH5090> the flock <WH6629> to the west <WH310> side <WH310> of the wilderness, <WH4057> and came <WH935> to Horeb, <WH2722> the mountain <WH2022> of God. <WH430>

And the angel <WH4397> of the Lord <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> to him in a blazing <WH3852> fire <WH784> from the midst <WH8432> of a bush; <WH5572> and he looked, <WH7200> and behold, <WH2009> the bush <WH5572> was burning <WH1197> with fire, <WH784> yet the bush <WH5572> was not consumed. <WH398>

So Moses <WH4872> said, <WH559> "I must turn <WH5493> aside <WH5493> now, <WH4994> and see <WH7200> this <WH2088> marvelous <WH1419> sight, <WH4758> why <WH4069> the bush <WH5572> is not burned <WH1197> up."

When the Lord <WH3068> saw <WH7200> that he turned <WH5493> aside <WH5493> to look, <WH7200> God <WH430> called <WH7121> to him from the midst <WH8432> of the bush, <WH5572> and said, <WH559> "Moses, <WH4872> Moses! <WH4872>" And he said, <WH559> "Here <WH2009> I am."

Then He said, <WH559> "Do not come <WH7126> near <WH7126> here; <WH1988> remove <WH5394> your sandals <WH5275> from your feet, <WH7272> for the place <WH4725> on which <WH834> you are standing <WH5975> is holy <WH6944> ground. <WH127>"

He said <WH559> also, "I am the God <WH430> of your father, the God <WH1> of Abraham, <WH430> the God <WH85> of Isaac, <WH430> and the God <WH3327> of Jacob. <WH430>" Then Moses <WH3290> hid <WH4872> his face, <WH5641> for he was afraid <WH6440> to look <WH3372> at God. <WH5027>

And the Lord <WH3068> said, <WH559> "I have surely <WH7200> seen <WH7200> the affliction <WH6040> of My people <WH5971> who <WH834> are in Egypt, <WH4714> and have given <WH8085> heed <WH8085> to their cry <WH6818> because <WH4480> <WH6440> of their taskmasters, <WH5065> for I am aware <WH3045> of their sufferings. <WH4341>

"So I have come <WH3381> down <WH3381> to deliver <WH5337> them from the power <WH3027> of the Egyptians, <WH4714> and to bring <WH5927> them up from that land <WH776> to a good <WH2896> and spacious <WH7342> land, <WH776> to a land <WH776> flowing <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey, <WH1706> to the place <WH4725> of the Canaanite <WH3669> and the Hittite <WH2850> and the Amorite <WH567> and the Perizzite <WH6522> and the Hivite <WH2340> and the Jebusite. <WH2983>

"And now, <WH6258> behold, <WH2009> the cry <WH6818> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> has come <WH935> to Me; furthermore, <WH1571> I have seen <WH7200> the oppression <WH3906> with which <WH834> the Egyptians <WH4714> are oppressing <WH3905> them.

"Therefore, come <WH1980> now, <WH6258> and I will send <WH7971> you to Pharaoh, <WH6547> so that you may bring <WH3318> My people, <WH5971> the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> out of Egypt. <WH4714>"

But Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> to God, <WH430> "Who <WH4310> am I, that I should go <WH1980> to Pharaoh, <WH6547> and that I should bring <WH3318> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> out of Egypt <WH4714>?"

And He said, <WH559> "Certainly <WH3588> I will be with you, and this <WH2088> shall be the sign <WH226> to you that it is I who have sent <WH7971> you: when you have brought <WH3318> the people <WH5971> out of Egypt, <WH4714> you shall worship <WH5647> God <WH430> at this <WH2088> mountain. <WH2022>"

Then Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> to God, <WH430> "Behold, <WH2009> I am going <WH935> to the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and I shall say <WH559> to them, 'The God <WH430> of your fathers has sent <WH1> me to you.' Now they may say <WH7971> to me, 'What <WH559> is His name <WH4100>?' What <WH8034> shall I say <WH4100> to them?"

And God <WH430> said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> "I AM <WH1961> WHO <WH834> I AM <WH1961>"; and He said, <WH559> "Thus <WH3541> you shall say <WH559> to the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> 'I AM <WH1961> has sent <WH7971> me to you.'"

And God, <WH430> furthermore, <WH5750> said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> "Thus <WH3541> you shall say <WH559> to the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> 'The Lord, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of your fathers, the God <WH1> of Abraham, <WH430> the God <WH85> of Isaac, <WH430> and the God <WH3327> of Jacob, <WH430> has sent <WH3290> me to you.' This <WH7971> is My name <WH2088> forever, <WH8034> and this <WH5769> is My memorial-name to all <WH2088> generations. <WH1755>

"Go <WH1980> and gather <WH622> the elders <WH2205> of Israel <WH3478> together, and say <WH559> to them, 'The Lord, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of your fathers, the God <WH1> of Abraham, <WH430> Isaac <WH85> and Jacob, <WH3327> has appeared <WH3290> to me, saying, <WH7200> "I am <WH559> indeed <WH6485> concerned <WH6485> about you and what has been done <WH6485> to you in Egypt. <WH6213>

"So I said, <WH559> I will bring <WH5927> you up out of the affliction <WH6040> of Egypt <WH4714> to the land <WH776> of the Canaanite <WH3669> and the Hittite <WH2850> and the Amorite <WH567> and the Perizzite <WH6522> and the Hivite <WH2340> and the Jebusite, <WH2983> to a land <WH776> flowing <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey. <WH1706>"'

"And they will pay <WH8085> heed <WH8085> to what <WH6963> you say; <WH6963> and you with the elders <WH2205> of Israel <WH3478> will come <WH935> to the king <WH4428> of Egypt, <WH4714> and you will say <WH559> to him, 'The Lord, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of the Hebrews, <WH5680> has met <WH7136> with us. So now, <WH6258> please, <WH4994> let us go <WH1980> a three <WH7969> days' journey <WH1870> into the wilderness, <WH4057> that we may sacrifice <WH2076> to the Lord <WH3068> our God. <WH430>'
"But I know <WH3045> that the king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714> will not permit <WH5414> you to go, <WH1980> except <WH3808> under compulsion. <WH2389> <WH3027>

"So I will stretch <WH7971> out My hand, <WH3027> and strike <WH5221> Egypt <WH4714> with all <WH3605> My miracles <WH6381> which <WH834> I shall do <WH6213> in the midst <WH7130> of it; and after <WH310> that he will let you go. <WH7971>

"And I will grant <WH5414> this <WH2088> people <WH5971> favor <WH2580> in the sight <WH5869> of the Egyptians; <WH4714> and it shall be that when you go, <WH1980> you will not go <WH1980> empty-handed.

"But every woman <WH802> shall ask <WH7592> of her neighbor <WH7934> and the woman who lives <WH1481> in her house, <WH1004> articles <WH3627> of silver <WH3701> and articles <WH3627> of gold, <WH2091> and clothing; <WH8071> and you will put <WH7760> them on your sons <WH1121> and daughters. <WH1323> Thus you will plunder <WH5337> the Egyptians. <WH4714>"
